acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type TJWDqzkquH
Then the collection should have exactly OPt81NF3JF elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type oNwOlbxnE6
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type Z3JoY32wp7=1pS5k7LWcO and value of type 5uFYEP3Gle=2fTbT813yN
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
